creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Striped sash with 4 selvedge ends; purple, green, blue warp stripes, all of them with small white warp stripes simulating a checkerboard effect; multicolored stripes are intercepted with red stripes.
title: Man's sash (Faja)
